Name: Corner Gas Animated
Title: Bait and Click
Desc: Wanda and Lacey entice the residents of Dog River with clickbait texts, while Oscar sets up a shop.
LongDescription: Wanda and Lacey entice the residents of Dog River with clickbait texts, while Oscar sets up a bait shop across the street from Corner Gas to teach Brent a business lesson; Davis and Karen involve Hank in a training exercise with chaotic results.
